name: Auxilium
description:
Auxilium was made to highlight the pressures health care workers are under, not only during pandemics but throughout their daily routine in helping patients and still protecting their own mental health. Play as a doctor at a general hospital as they treat wave after wave of patients with varying injuries as well as help those who work with you to make their jobs easier. However, even superheroes need help sometimes. 

Auxilium : to help others, help yourself, and when you can no longer do those, to ask for help.
